description:
Part A: Tayori ends up getting film that doesn’t belong to him developed, and falling in love with the woman in the pictures. He ends up asking Moguro to help him meet her. Despite all the uncertainty, he goes to meet her and something insane happens!
 
Part B: Oite Kazuhito just retired from his job that he had been at for many years. As soon as he got home, there were divorce papers from his wife waiting for him. After that, he was living a lonely life, unable to see his granddaughter. Then one day, Moguro comes up with an idea...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die perfekte Frau vom Film / Der falsche Enkel
Hirotta Film no Hito / Uso Mago
La fille des photos égarées – Le petit-fils de substitution
The Person in the Acquired Film / Fake Grandchild
拾ったフィルムのヒト / ウソ孫
